sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本课时将近结束，大家可以休息一会儿。

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本课时快要竣事，各人可以休息一会儿。

sentences.english: He began the class with a story.
sentences.chinese: 他在开始上课时讲了一个故事。

sentences.english: Please return the session money to the student.
sentences.chinese: 请将课时金额退至学生账户。

sentences.english: The next class the professor handed the tests back out.
sentences.chinese: 下次上课时，教授将考卷发下去。

sentences.english: Perhaps you remember during your gratitude session.
sentences.chinese: 也许你在感恩课时才想起。

sentences.english: Itll take us two periods to grasp(master) these.
sentences.chinese: 这些需要我们两课时才能掌握。

sentences.english: Please remember to say thank you to your coach after every lesson.
sentences.chinese: 每节课下课时，请记得跟你的教练说谢谢。

sentences.english: The school agreed to let him make up some of the time he had missed.
sentences.chinese: 学校同意让他补上部分课时。

sentences.english: Monica was very attentive to her teacher in class.
sentences.chinese: 蒙妮卡上课时非常专心的听老师讲课。

sentences.english: Okay.I think our time is up.
Please fill up and submit emergency contact form at the first class.
sentences.chinese: 第一次上课时请填交紧急联系单。

sentences.english: Now, class is over, they are not in the classroom.
sentences.chinese: 现在是下课时间，怎么在教室看不见他们呢？

sentences.english: That's which le(so abundance) to the class . Time's up.
sentences.chinese: 下课具体时间已到，本课时就讲这么多。

sentences.english: I am willing to share the summary of the advance class with others.
sentences.chinese: 本人愿意在高级班上课时上台和学员分享本篇心得。

sentences.english: This clbum will be over in a minute: now let's take a nap(break up :catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本课时将近终止，大师可以休息一会儿。

definition: to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
school begins/give a course/teach a subject
tutorial/period of tuition for one or two students
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to give classes/to work as a teacher
